info.name: Lifehacker Cleaner for new design
info.description:
Simple style that removes all advertisements, the left sidebar, the previews above the logobar and widens the content to match the logobar.  Designed for the new Lifehacker design on 8/21/2008.

Updated to remove the sponsored links on search pages.
